DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify three dos safe effective dose Botulinum toxin type A injection one side soft palate treat snoring .
DOC.brief_title: Dose Finding Study Botulinum Toxin Type A Injection Treat Habitual Snoring
DOC.criteria: Female male subject age 1870 Subjects suffer snore least 3 month prior study start seek help treat snoring Subjects peak Snoring Index [ SI ] ≥ 15/ hour sleep [ h ] baseline visit Subjects bed partner least three month prior study start . Subjects understand nature study provide write Informed Consent screen visit . Subjects understand study procedure well posse ability willingness abide procedure course study Obese subject ( Body Mass Index ≥ 30 ) Subjects severe obstructive sleep apnea syndrome Subjects ApneaHypopnea Index ≥ 10 /hour sleep and/ Respiratory Disturbance Index ≥ 25 / hour sleep baseline visit Subjects undergone Botulinum neurotoxin treatment history Subjects generalize disorder muscle activity ( e.g . myasthenia gravis , LambertEaton syndrome ) Acute infection pharynx
